quest.name: Like Pulling Teeth
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
This caring carpenter could use a sharp eye and a steady hand.
objectives: Take aim and use your blowgun to incapacitate a razor-tusked swine.
Obtain a tusk from the razor-tusked swine.
Deliver the tusk to the caring carpenter.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: You are...Forename, yes? Master Matoya speaks highly of you. If I may, I would make a request of you.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: It is my duty to craft arms for the Night's Blessed, but I've recently found myself without tusks for spears.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: If Master Matoya is to be believed, and I have no reason to doubt her, you are skilled with blow darts. Might you be willing to assist me in hunting swine?

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: If you are so inclined, meet with me at the edge of Lake Tusi Mek'ta.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: If you climb up this tree, you should have a clear view of the area.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: Sooner or later a boar will come to drink from the lake, and that's where you come in. Use the darts to paralyze it, and then we can safely extract one of their tusks.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: It's been quite some time since I've seen such precision. Well done.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: If you would see to plucking a tusk from the swine, I will gather the rest of the supplies I need. When you've finished, meet me back at Slitherbough.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: You didn't have trouble procuring a tusk, did you?

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: My, that's quite a find. This will make for an excellent spear.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: A pity the swine have grown so scarce since the Flood.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: We could possibly find use for their hides or their meat, but it would be all too easy to hunt them to extinction.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: The same holds true for many of the animals here in the Greatwood.

dialogue.name: GENTLECRAFTSMAN03442
dialogue.text: We must be mindful to take only what we need. An important lesson to learn for any who would call these woods home.
